entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
